original_text: I will be very angry with you. I will kill you in war. Your wives will become widows. Your children will no longer have any family.
korean_text: 나의 노가 맹렬하므로 내가 칼로 너희를 죽이리니 너희의 아내는 과부가 되고 너희 자녀는 고아가 되리라

sentences.original_text: I will be very angry with you.
I will kill you in war.
Your children will no longer have any family.
